values: Horror is a feeling of being very afraid or shocked.
The audience screamed in horror when the ghost appeared in the movie.
n. 惊骇；惨状；极端厌恶；令人恐怖的事物

n.恐怖，战栗，憎恶，厌恶，adj.恐怖的，令人毛骨悚然的
Horror refers to a feeling of intense fear, dread, or revulsion.
noun, adjective
Refers to something that is scary, frightening or disturbing.
